text: To All the Boys I've Loved Before is a 2018 American teen romance film directed by Susan Johnson, based on Jenny Han’s 2014 novel of the same name. The film stars Lana Condor, Noah Centineo, Janel Parrish, Anna Cathcart, Emilija Baranac, Israel Broussard, and John Corbett. It was released by Netflix on August 17, 2018.
